title: If you were born in 0001 and immortal, what one item (from anywhere in the world) would you want to acquire to make you the richest person today? It can be a lost treasure as well. - Quora

response.answer_text: Usury, [ˈyo͞oZH(ə)rē] NOUN the illegal action or practice of lending money at unreasonably high rates of interest."the medieval prohibition on usury" I’d want to have others owe me money. Not only would the money make me money, I’d have people owing me favors, I could have political marriages, I could control political marriages, being Eurocentric as I’d not like pre Columbian Native American economies, I could have Kings, Emperors and Popes owing me. Pulling strings from behind the scenes would be the way to go and I’d uses assorted people as my fronts so the heat would be on them. Machiavelli in Florence would be one of my people. Side note, being an immortal, and wealthy, I could have had Machiavellian discussions with the dude himself! ah, but the Church! What most don’t know is the Monestaries and Nunneries were incredible businesses, Franchises if you will, with money making enterprises like leather works, carpentry, scribes, weaving, and wine making. Incredible wealth passed through the monestaries and given that long to operate, I’d have my own order. So now, I’m into money lending, influence peddling, production of goods, and land.
